name: 10Fox
description:
A clean and simple theme designed to make Firefox look more modern on Windows 10.

This theme is a work in progress and will be updated over time based on user feedback.
additional_info: Details This theme was developed and tested on Firefox 40 running on Windows 10. Compatibility with older versions of Firefox is unknown at this time. 10Fox materialized after its initial concept was posted on the Firefox subreddit here. Please share any feedback/issues/suggestions to this post. Version History 0.9.1 -Added custom download button icon and interaction effects 0.9.0 -Initial release Credits /u/HughesMDflyer4 - Original concept, maintainer of the project /u/isthisnametakenyet - Turning my concept into an actual theme and providing a great starting point. /r/firefox Community - Feedback and motivating me to continue work on this theme
